attributes.action: require bicycles on pulic roads to have a number plate.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This would enable innocent people to claim against the rider if they are hit by a cyclist either walking or on another form of transport. It may also prevent them riding on pavements when it suits them riding the wrong way down one way streets having to use lights at night.jumping red lights or anything else they should not be doing on the roads.Also it may help reduce thier injuries and costs to the national health.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
